name: Cream Cheese Icing for Cinnamon Rolls
description: Cream Cheese Icing for Cinnamon Rolls is an easy 4 ingredient recipe that will take homemade & store bought cinnamon rolls to the next level!
ingredients: 4 ounces cream cheese softened to room temperature
Â½ cup butter softened to room temperature
instructions: In a large mixing bowl or stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, combine cream cheese, butter, powdered sugar and heavy cream on low until smooth. Optional: Add up to 2 teaspoons of your favorite extract. Using an icing spatula or butter knife, smooth onto warm cinnamon rolls or warm in a microwave safe syrup jar or large measuring cup and stir to pour over room temperature rolls.
